net.grinder.engine.communication
Class ConsoleListener

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.engine.communication.ConsoleListener

public final class ConsoleListener
extends Object

Process console messages and allows them to be asynchronously queried.

Author:
Philip Aston

Constructor Detail

ConsoleListener

public ConsoleListener(Condition notifyOnMessage,
                       Logger logger)
Constructor.

Parameters:
notifyOnMessage - An Object to notify when a message arrives.
logger - A Logger to log received event messages to.
Method Detail

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shut down.

waitForMessage

public void waitForMessage()
Wait until any message is received.

After calling this method, the actual messages can be determined using received(int).

checkForMessage

public boolean checkForMessage(int mask)
Check for messages matching the given mask.

After calling this method, the actual messages can be determined using received(int).

Parameters:
mask - The messages to check for.
Returns:
true if at least one message matches the mask parameter has been received since the last time the message was checked for, or if communications have been shutdown. false otherwise.

discardMessages

public void discardMessages(int mask)
Discard pending messages that match the given mask.

Parameters:
mask - The messages to discard.

received

public boolean received(int mask)
Query the messages set up by the last checkForMessage(int) or waitForMessage() call.

Parameters:
mask - The messages to check for.
Returns:
true if one or more of the received messages matches mask.

registerMessageHandlers

public void registerMessageHandlers(MessageDispatchRegistry messageDispatcher)
Registers message handlers with a dispatcher.

Parameters:
messageDispatcher - The dispatcher.

getLastStartGrinderMessage

public StartGrinderMessage getLastStartGrinderMessage()
Return the last StartGrinderMessage received.

Returns:
The message.
